wiki.content:
"MMMBop" is a song written and performed by the American pop rock band Hanson from their 1997 debut album Middle of Nowhere. "MMMBop" was one of the biggest debut singles of all time; it reached number one in 27 countries, including the United States, the UK, Germany and Australia; in the UK, the song sold 710,000 copies and stayed at number one for 3 weeks. It was voted the best single of the year in The Village Voice Pazz & Jop critics poll, while also topping critics' polls from such media as Rolling Stone, Spin, and VH1. "MMMBop" was nominated for two Grammys at the 40th Annual Grammy Awards in February 1998. It was the band most successful single to date.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

track.name: Mmmbop
comments: oh Gott, wie lang hab ich diesen Song schon nicht mehr gehört - ewig
Oh, hello childhood. I didn't see you there.
This song still makes me smile after all those years!

Funny how some things stick with you. I remember that when this song was popular, my older-older sister joked (in either K-Mart or Target) the following: "Mmmbop till your boobs drop". My younger-older sister was not pleased, she felt that my older-older sister was being negative towards Hanson. As for the song itself, I would say (as of 2013) that this song is fast becoming a pop classic.
God, I was over the moon when I got the album for my 12th birthday!
'it's a cigarette no one knows ...'  I will always love this song.
Will always be a classic they will be 50yrs old still singing this and Ill be right there singing with them!
